sentences.sentence: Shot from a window high above the Boulevard du Temple in Paris in 1838, using the brand new daguerrotype process, the plate captures a solitary gentleman who has stopped to have his shoes shined.
sentences.translation: 照片拍摄于1838年，角度是从高处的一扇窗子对准巴黎的圣殿大道。 摄影师采用了全新的达盖尔摄影术，银版捕捉到一位停下来擦鞋的绅士。
